name: Code Editor
description:
A code editor that enables you to write syntax-highlighted source code in several languages.


Features:

  • framed/unframed styles
  • light and dark mode
  • font size


Language support:

  • JavaScript (with support for TypeScript / JSX)
  • HTML
  • C++
  • Markdown
  • XML
  • Rust
  • SQL
  • CSS
  • Python
  • PHP
  • JSON
  • Java


Widget source code: https://github.com/freedmand/figma-code-editor-widget
